Family offer

Discover our exclusive Family Offer designed to create unforgettable memories. Enjoy a perfect getaway with these amazing benefits:
  • 1 Night in a Spacious Family Room:
    Comfort and convenience for the whole family.
  • Delicious Buffet Breakfast:
    Start your day with a rich and varied breakfast spread.
  • Course Lunch for Two at "Park" Restaurant**:
    Savor a delightful meal in our renowned first-floor restaurant.
  • Welcome Drink:
    Refresh and relax with a complimentary welcome drink upon arrival.
  • Complimentary WiFi:
    Stay connected with free high-speed internet access.
  • Fitness Room Access:
    Keep up with your fitness routine in our well-equipped gym.
  • Free Parking:
    Enjoy hassle-free parking at our hotel.
